partnerTypes.title: Partnership Programs

currentPartners.title: Our Trusted Partners
currentPartners.description: We're proud to work with industry-leading companies and innovative startups.

process.title: Partnership Process
process.description: Becoming a partner is simple and straightforward.

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: Fill out our partnership application form and tell us about your business.

steps.title: Review
steps.description: Our team will review your application and assess partnership fit.

steps.title: Discussion
steps.description: We'll schedule a call to discuss partnership opportunities and answer questions.

steps.title: Agreement
steps.description: Sign the partnership agreement and set up your partner account.

steps.title: Onboarding
steps.description: Complete onboarding training and get access to partner resources.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Start collaborating and building success together.

testimonials.name: David Martinez
testimonials.quote: Partnering with Coreway has allowed us to offer world-class solutions to our clients. Their support and expertise have been invaluable to our growth.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.quote: The partnership program is well-structured and the team is incredibly responsive. We've successfully delivered multiple projects together.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.quote: Coreway's technical capabilities complement our business strategy services perfectly. Our clients benefit from this powerful combination.

faq.question: What are the requirements to become a partner?
faq.answer: Requirements vary by partnership type. Generally, we look for established businesses with a track record of delivering quality services, alignment with our values, and a commitment to client success.

faq.question: Is there a fee to join the partner program?
faq.answer: No, there are no upfront fees to join our partner program. We believe in mutual success and only succeed when our partners succeed.

faq.question: How long does the application process take?
faq.answer: The application review typically takes 5-7 business days. Once approved, onboarding can be completed within 1-2 weeks depending on the partnership type.

faq.question: What kind of support do partners receive?
faq.answer: Partners get access to a dedicated partner manager, technical support, marketing resources, training materials, and a partner portal with all necessary tools and documentation.

faq.question: Can we co-brand solutions?
faq.answer: Yes, depending on the partnership tier, we offer white-label and co-branding options for certain solutions.

faq.question: How are commissions and revenue sharing calculated?
faq.answer: Commission structures vary by partnership type and are clearly outlined in the partnership agreement. We offer competitive rates and transparent tracking through our partner portal.

cta.title: Ready to Partner With Us?
cta.description: Join our partner ecosystem and let's build something amazing together.
